long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Infinite Mario Bros is an exciting game available as a Chrome extension. You can also play it for free on the website https://mariogames.org/. This game is a variation of the classic Super Mario Bros, offering endless levels and challenges for players to enjoy. As Mario, the iconic plumber, you will embark on a thrilling adventure through various worlds filled with obstacles, enemies, and power-ups. Your goal is to navigate through each level, collecting coins, defeating enemies, and ultimately rescuing Princess Peach from the clutches of the villainous Bowser. With its nostalgic graphics and addictive gameplay, Infinite Mario Bros provides hours of entertainment for fans of the Mario franchise. Whether you're a longtime fan or new to the world of Mario, this game is a fantastic way to experience the timeless magic of Super Mario Bros. Play Infinite Mario Bros for free and embark on an endless journey with everyone's favorite plumber!

If you want to play Classroom 6x, we have a link for quick access to our website by click on Classroom 6x. Have fun!
